I'm obviously not a big fan of tile coding :) I'm not really
concern=
ed whether it might do better in some cases; the problem with
it is that it=
 is a dead end for future progress because it is about
ruining our ability =
to exploit geometric relationships.

ght is 1, I can easily learn
to treat right and left the same way by simply=
 running the left-
right dimension through a Gaussian centered at 0. Anythi=
ng above

akes a geometric generalization.

ny innovation
